participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, enjoys casual conversations and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: Horror movies are my favorites. I've a son who is in junior high school. My father used to work for Home Depot. I spent a decade working in the human services field.

participant_2.name: Jasmine
participant_2.personality: Playful and adventurous, loves engaging in hobbies and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I like donuts. My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse. On weekends I do live action roleplaying events. I play a lot of Call of Duty.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going? üòä
Hi :) i just had a breakfast full of donuts! I love them. What did you eat today?
that is my favorite ! yes , i was starved ! üòù
hehe, are you listening to music?
slipknot . i want to visit the pyramids
no , i don't like to drive .
What about consol games? I play call of duty.
i like sims and call of duty or fallout . how is it going today ? üòé
Sims ha? Great. So you like roleplaying? I do. I join roleplaying events at weekends.
i love it , especially if blue jello is involved . how are you this afternoon ? üòÅ
i'm well . just practicing my lines üòù
